publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-261 Cathy Jamieson: The Draft Scotland Act 1998 (Transfer of Functions to Scottish Ministers etc.) (No.2) Order 2003-That the Justice 1 Committee, in consideration of the draft Scotland Act 1998 (Transfer of Functions to the Scottish Ministers etc.) (No.2) Order 2003, recommends that the order be approved. Supported by: Hugh Henry*
